page.title: 09RURAL LIFESTYLE
page.content: Farms in the block are either solitary or in Willey village.Some need to travel a distance to part of their land.It is a good farming area & most use modern methods. The rural village of Willey has a pop- ulation of 72(1985) a decrease from 90 in 1962.Unusually there are as many as 9 batchelors & 5 homes do not have any television.Children choose to cross the county boundary to go to school in Lutterworth,Leics 3 miles away.The village hall improvements in 1985,a new kichen & internal access to two toilets.Once the village school,closed over 30 years,it still has a Victorian Jubilee oil painting 1897.Elections are held here and village & church social events. The local pub is popular with both locals and visitors.
